text: Ni jwaŵechete mundu jwakulupilila jwa kwiŵasa lya Firiauna juŵasisaga chikulupi chakwe: “Ana nkusaka kum’bulaga mundu ligongo lyakuŵecheta kuti: ‘M’mbuje gwangu ni Allah?’ Kutendaga soni jwalakwe pamasile pam’bichilile ni ilosyo yakuonechela kuumila kwa M’mbuje gwenu? Sano najuŵaga jwaunami, basi unami wakweo tiun’jonanje nsyene, nambo naga juli jwakuona nikuti tiyimpate ine mu yaakumpa chilanga (kuti tiyimpate pa duniya pepano). Chisimu Allah jwangan’jongola mundu jwali jwakupelenganya malile (pakonanga), jwaunami kusyene.”
